Question.Subject: Can you put fake information when you do surveys online?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
For some surveys, you can't, but for some you can. If you're doing something like prizerebel then I recommend you put real info, the info doesn't usually send in some offers anyway.
Answer mine? http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index;_ylt=Aj.8PJFICHoiQKIUC97Gy4jsy6IX;_ylv=3?qid=20100228161319AAYxADd
